transcription: I'll show you how to make gooey chocolate and pecan nut brownies. So we start by melting the butter and chocolate over simmering water. Whisk together your eggs and sugar. Then we add the melted chocolate and butter. Whisk that together. Break in the pecan nuts. Just break them, leave them nice and chunky.  and then finally sift in the flour. Once it's all mixed together, just going to pour it into these silicone moulds. Then we bake in the oven for between 12 and 15 minutes, they're cooked on the outside, nice and gooey in the middle. So when they come out of the oven they should be gooey in the middle, leave them for about 15-20 minutes to cool down before you try to get them out of the moulds. So we finish with a dusting of icing sugar, a touch of cocoa powder,  and some whipped double cream. There we have gooey chocolate pecan nut brownie.
